Module webfx.extras.time.layout
Package dev.webfx.extras.time.layout.impl

Class TimeLayoutBase<C,T>

java.lang.Object
dev.webfx.extras.time.window.impl.TimeWindowImpl<T>
dev.webfx.extras.time.window.impl.ListenableTimeWindowImpl<T>
dev.webfx.extras.time.layout.impl.TimeLayoutBase<C,T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasHeightProperty, HasVisibleProperty, HasWidthHeightProperties, HasWidthProperty, CanSelectChild<C>, InteractiveLayer<C>, Layer<C>, CanLayout, HasLayoutCountProperty, TimeLayout<C,T>, HasTimeProjector<T>, ListenableTimeWindow<T>, TimeWindow<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalendarLayout, GanttLayoutImpl
public abstract class TimeLayoutBase<C,T> extends ListenableTimeWindowImpl<T> implements TimeLayout<C,T>
Author:
Bruno Salmon
